title: Bunker 10
description: At eight o'clock in the evening, 24 December 2007, Pinewood Military Installation exploded. The blast ripped apart acres of forest and devastated the remote highland valley where the base was located. No official cause was given for the incident. Inside Pinewood were 185 male and female personnel--a mixture of scientists and soldiers. There were also seven teenagers. This is the story of their last day . . .Bunker 10 is a high-octane thriller perfect for fans of video games, science fiction, and television shows like 24.
author: Jan-Andrew Henderson
